s0001: Sun Tzu Wu was a Qi man.
s0002: With military methods appeared before Wu King Helu.
s0003: Helu said: 'Your thirteen chapters, I have completely viewed them, can make a small test restraining troops?'
s0007: Thus permitted it, took palace beauties, obtained one hundred eighty persons.
s0008: Sun Tzu divided into two teams, with the king's favored consorts two as team leaders each, all commanded to hold halberds.
s0009: Commanded them saying: 'You know your heart and left right hand back?'
s0011: Sun Tzu said: 'Forward, then look at heart;
s0016: Regulations having been issued, then set up axe and battle-axe, immediately three commands five declarations.
s0017: Thus drummed right, women greatly laughed.
s0018: Sun Tzu said: 'Regulations unclear, declared commands not familiar, general's crime.'
s0019: Again three commands five declarations and drummed left, women again greatly laughed.
s0020: Sun Tzu said: 'Regulations unclear, declared commands not familiar, general's crime;
s0021: having already been clear yet not following method, officers and soldiers' crime.'
s0022: Thus wished to behead left right team leaders.
s0023: Wu king from platform observed, saw about to behead beloved consorts, greatly alarmed.
s0024: Hastily sent envoy to issue command saying: 'I already know general can use troops.
s0025: I without these two consorts, food not sweet, wish not to behead.'
s0026: Sun Tzu said: 'Subject having already received command as general, general in army, lord's commands have some not accepted.'
s0027: Thus beheaded two team leaders to show.
s0028: Used their seconds as team leaders, thus again drummed.
s0029: Women left right forward back kneel rise all hit compass square ink-line, none dared make sound.
s0030: Thus Sun Tzu sent envoy to report king saying: 'Troops already orderly, king can try descend to observe, as king wishes to use them, though go to water fire still acceptable.'
